description.value: When Firing a Single Shot from a Pistol, Heavy, or Vehicle Weapon with the Accurate Quality whilst Benefiting from the Aim Action, character treats weapon as if it were a Basic Weapon (AKA, +1d10 Damage per Two Degrees of Success, up to 2d10, can't generate Righteous Fury)
